name: Pik and Nik (Online)
description:
Pik and Nik (Online) is a 2D Defender-Shooter Game developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team. This game was created for the "Create Jam 2022: Spring Cottage Edition". 

The theme of the jam is Cottagecore with "picnic" being the keyword.

Pik is defending Nik and the picnic from anti-cottagecore invaders trying to disturb the peace.

Controls: 

WAD -> Move & Aim

Left Mouse Click  -> Shoot

Right Mouse Click -> Deploy Basket (Basket attracts enemies)

SpaceBar -> Deploy Sentry (Sentry kills flying enemies)

Esc -> Pause Game
